mapper.select: SELECT WORD_ID, WORD_NM, ENG_NM, WORD_DC, SYNONM, B.USER_NM, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A, COMTNEMPLYRINFO B WHERE A.WORD_ID=#{wordId} and A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID

SELECT WORD_ID, WORD_NM, ENG_NM, WORD_DC, SYNONM, USER_NM, TO_CHAR(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,WORD.* FROM ( SELECT WORD_ID, WORD_NM, ENG_NM, WORD_DC, SYNONM, B.USER_NM, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A, COMTNEMPLYRINFO B WHERE 1=1 and A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID
AND WORD_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND ENG_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
ORDER BY WORD_ID DESC ) WORD ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{recordCountPerPage} and RNUM > #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNWORDDICARYINFO A, COMTNEMPLYRINFO B WHERE 1=1 and A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID
AND WORD_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND ENG_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
